'''''Minecraft: The Wild Update (Original Game Soundtrack)''''' is the third soundtrack for ''[[Minecraft]]'' by [[Lena Raine]], in collaboration with [[Samuel Åberg]]. It was released on Spotify on April 20th, 2022, followed by other platforms the following day.

The album includes 4 songs for a total length of about 20 minutes. It features all of the new tracks introduced in [[Java Edition 22w16a]], including the new [[Music Disc]], but without "[[Ancestry]]", which is found on ''[[Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs (Original Game Soundtrack)]]'' instead.
